Question Text: On a scale of 1-10 how concerned are you about your personal safety?
Have you ever received direct threats (verbal written or digital)?
Do you have any active restraining orders or protective orders in place?
In your view are there any individuals or groups who may pose a threat to you or your family?
What types of threats concern you most?
Are you involved in any controversial matters or litigation that might increase your threat exposure?
In your view how would you describe your public profile?
How frequently do you engage with media or give public statements?
Have you been the subject of negative media coverage or public controversy?
Which social media platforms are you active on?
In your view how much personal information or location data do you share on social media?
How would you describe the predictability of your daily schedule?
Do you typically vary your routes between home and work?
Do you have regular evening or weekend routines?
How often do you attend public events or high-profile gatherings?
Do you have family members who could be vulnerable to targeting?
Do you have specific concerns about the safety of any family members?
If you have children how predictable are their schedules?
Do any family members have a public profile or media exposure?
How would you describe your current level of personal security?
Do you currently have personal protection or security detail?
What security measures do you have in place at your residence?
Have you received any security awareness training?
Do you carry any personal safety devices?
How do you typically commute?
How often do you travel for business or personal reasons?
Do you travel internationally to locations you consider high-risk?
When traveling do you share travel plans publicly or on social media?
What personal information about you is publicly available?
Do you actively manage your online presence and digital footprint?
How would you describe your family members' digital footprint?
Do you have emergency contact protocols established?
Has your family received emergency or security awareness training?
Do you have duress codes or signals established?
Overall how secure do you feel in your daily life?
